Text: Re FPL follow up item Cc Tana Jones will forward it to you shortly Sorry for the delay Jason Serge Martin SGM teelhectorcom AM To cc Subject FPL follow up item Jason Just one more thing as Mr Columbo would say You mentioned last month that you expected in response to my request to be able to send me a copy of your standard form of longform ISDA confirm Could you do so at this time Thanks Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida voice fax

Re FPL follow up item Cc Tana Jones will forward it to you shortly Sorry for the delay Jason Serge Martin SGM teelhectorcom AM To cc Subject FPL follow up item Jason Just one more thing as Mr Columbo would say You mentioned last month that you expected in response to my request to be able to send me a copy of your standard form of longform ISDA confirm Could you do so at this time Thanks Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida voice fax

Prime Brokerage Clearance Agreement Cc Kelly I am working with Sara Shackleton for the next few months on loan from Andrews Kurth This morning I am sending comments to the abovereferenced Agreement to both Chase HQ and Thomas Weisel Please also note that Sara sent comments out yesterday to Direct Trading on the Customer Agreement Should you have any questions my extension is Jason Peters

Notice of Intent not to Waive Rightsand Carol Attached for your review please find a draft of a letter to be distributed by ENA to Counterparties who are either i in Default or ii over the Collateral Threshold and for which ENA does not desire to call such default or demand such collateral Should you have any comments please let me know Jason

Re Bridgeline Gas Marketing LLCI have a meeting w Mark at Other than that Im open Sara CT AM To cc Subject Re Bridgeline Gas Marketing LLC Jason fyi Also Randy Curry did call me yesterday but wasnt available when I returned the call Also lets get Sakura Dellsher executed and we should create a file since were noting the ADM agreement which we did for Bridgeline Could we please talk this afternoon about outstanding agreements ss Forwarded by Sara ShackletonHOUECT on AM Brant Reves AM To Sara CT cc Subject Re Bridgeline Gas Marketing LLC hello Sara I think this should be a high priority once they take on an ISDA attorney Per your recommendation I contacted Randy Curry President of Bridgeline and passed along your thoughts about Jason I gave him your phone number and he sounded enthusiastic about wanting to talk with him God knows they need an attorney Right now I think we can take this off the priority list Thanks Brant From Sara Shackleton on AM To Brant CT cc Subject Bridgeline Gas Marketing LLC Brant Is this really high priority for our legalcredit discussions We havent heard from these guys since April Sara

Re Fwd Florida Power Light Company Attached Files Cc Attached for your review please find a blacklined copy of the FPLEnron ISDA marked to show changes to the draft previously provided to us Please provide us with your comments to the Credit Support Annex at your earliest convenience I am in the process of obtaining approval to release our long form ISDA it should not be a problem and I will forward it to you shortly please call me at with any comments or questions Serge Martin SGM teelhectorcom AM To cc Subject Fwd Florida Power Light Company Attached Files Jason As you requested I am forwarding a copy of my March note to Sara with the clean and marked copies of the FPLEnron ISDA schedule attached I have a small favor to ask too if I may By coincidence I am updating a form of longform ISDA confirm for the same client ie the form used where an ISDA master agreement is not even in draft yet and a large trade is made I have seen and prepared a good number of these but Ive not seen Enrons Since your schedule was one of the best drawn Ive seen and Ive seen maybe Id appreciate your sending me a reference copy of your longform confirm if you wouldnt mind Id be happy to reciprocate Regards Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida voice fax Date Mon Mar From Serge Martin teelhectorcom To Subject Florida Power Light Company Attached Files Sara Enclosed are clean and marked copies of a revised schedule for the proposed ISDA master agreement between Enron and FPL I have only reviewed and commented at this time on the master agreements schedule itself I have left the credit support annex attached within the same document as you sent it but have not yet reviewed or commented on it so ignore it for now I have reviewed many such schedules and found your form to be quite good as you may know those of some large marketmakers are not so good so please dont take this as patronizing its a sincere compliment Hopefully you will find the revisions equally acceptable I look forward to your comments or approval Regards Serge Serge G Martin Steel Hector Davis LLP South Biscayne Blvd Miami Florida voice fax DOC DOC

Prime Brokerage Clearance Agreement Cc Kelly I am working with Sara Shackleton for the next few months on loan from Andrews Kurth This morning I am sending comments to the abovereferenced Agreement to both Chase HQ and Thomas Weisel Please also note that Sara sent comments out yesterday to Direct Trading on the Customer Agreement Should you have any questions my extension is Jason Peters

Information Services Agreement PH Energy Cc Attached for your review please find a draft of the abovereferenced Agreement Please pay special attention to the provisions in the Agreement which have been highlighted or bracketed Please also fill in the blanks ie the missing definitions Feel free to call me with any comments or questions at Rhett Jackson in tax is looking into any possible issue relating to the value added taxes Jason

Information Services Agreement Energy Argus Cc Attached for your review please find a clean draft of the abovereferenced Agreement Please note that there are several provisions which I have highlighted for your special attention This Agreement will require several additional changes after you provide me with the payment tables Please call me at with any comments or questions Jason

EnronSportscom Agreement Cc Mark Taylor asked that I take a quick look at the abovereferenced agreement Here are my comments Recital B We should delete Internet access and Definition of Agreement I am not aware of the term annexures I assume it is the equivalent of annexes Section Should we specify the size and location of the Enron Link and the Sportscom link Section Enron should be deleted before the phrase in the event Section The word form should be changed to from Section The phrase will be made available should be deleted I do not know the creditworthiness of Sportscom but should we require that they maintain general liability insurance to back up the indemnities which they are providing us Section Should we include transfers to Affiliates as transfers permissible without consent of the other party Should you have any comments or questions please do not hesitate to call me at Thanks Jason

Kase and Company Information Services Agreement Cc find a copy of the abovereferenced agreement blacklined to show changes to the Energy Argus Agreement Please call me with your comments I did not know the name of the publication Please pay special attention to the reps and warranties Jason
Confidentiality Agreement Globalview Software Cc Attached for your review please find a draft of the abovereferenced Confidentiality Agreement Please call me with any comments or questions Jason
Confidentiality Agreement Globalview Cc Rahil Attached please find a revised draft of the abovereferenced Agreement Please call me with any comments or questions Jason

Provider Agreement and General Terms and Conditions Enron North America CorpEnergy Gateway Cc As a follow up to my voice mail we have the following comments to the abovereferenced Agreements Provider Agreement notices Please add the following Notice of any default shall also be sent to Enron Corp Smith Street Houston Texas Attn Executive Vice president and General Counsel General Terms and Conditions Section Third sentence Please add and written notice to Provider as set forth in the Provider Agreement after the word System Section Third Sentence Please add during the term of this Agreement after the word time Section Sixth Sentence Please substitute the accepting party in lieu of the word User Section Seventh Sentence Please substitute EnergyGateway shall cause the System to in lieu of the phrase The System shall Section Please delete the word grossly and the last phrase User or a third party Section Please revise the third sentence to read Transaction fees will be based on the total volume set forth in an accepted transaction and will be invoiced by EnergyGateway in full following the transaction confirmation Section Please add the word written before the word consent Section Please make this provision mutual and delete the last half of the section beginning with RESULTING FROM Section Please change Ohio to New York and delete the second sentence We prefer arbitration Please let me know if you would agree to look at our standard arbitration provision In the fourth sentence please change EnergyGateways to Either partys please provide me with a copy of the privacy policy I was unable to locate it on your website Should you have any comments or questions please call me at Your attention to this matter is greatly appreciated Jason Peters
